alert.note: Alert for Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:01PM EDT until April 05 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY AND NORTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES... At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sidney, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Lockington, Newbern, Ballou, Pemberton and Plattsville. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 82 and 90. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
